EmailTemplate.description: An email alert that goes out to the approver when the Product Package is submitted for approval.
EmailTemplate.name: Product Package Submitted For Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: The following Approvals are Pending your Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello, The Product Package {!LLC_BI__Product_Package__c.Name} requires your approval. To approve or reject this item, please click this link: {!ApprovalRequest.External_URL}. Here is the link to Credit Memo: {!LLC_BI__Product_Package__c.CF_Credit_Memo_Page_Link__c} Thank you.
